nodes.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you donâ€™t want to share in images youâ€™re going to share anyway. Hide peopleâ€™s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
nodes.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets
nodes.author: Geoff Pado

nodes.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
nodes.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

nodes.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
nodes.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.
nodes.author: rabble

nodes.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
nodes.title: bilgge. - a privacy-paranoid free service for your notes and secrets

nodes.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isnâ€™t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
nodes.title: Presearch - A Better Search Engine - Support decentralized search by becoming a node operator.
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

nodes.excerpt: Ethical Product Alternatives is a simple, open-source browser extension built to help you discover new, more ethical tools focused on privacy every time you open a new tab.
nodes.title: Ethical Product Alternatives - Ethical alternative products every time you open a new tab
nodes.author: Ria Blagburn

nodes.excerpt: Simple - Essential analytics in a single page dashboard. No Code - Find how users interact with buttons, videos & forms by selecting them from your page. Custom Events & Funnels. Privacy friendly - No personal data collected. No Cookies. GRDP & CCPA compliant.
nodes.title: GingerTag - Simple, No-Code, Privacy Friendly Analytics
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
nodes.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
nodes.author: Dylan Field

nodes.excerpt: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create aliases, randomly generated email addresses that forward to your real inbox. Use it to protect your online accounts - and your identity - from hackers.
nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

nodes.excerpt: Canary Mail brings a simple design, powerful feature-set, and easy-to-use email encryption. Now on Android.
nodes.title: Canary Mail - Privacy-friendly email app for macOS, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Sohel Sanghani

nodes.excerpt: Browse the web like it should be â€“ free of nags to accept cookies or privacy invasive tracking. It's tiny, fast, free, open, secure and without any access to your data.
nodes.title: Hush for Safari - Block nags to accept cookies and privacyâ€¨ invasive tracking
nodes.author: Joel Arvidsson

nodes.excerpt: An easy to use, privacy-focused alternative to the big analytics platforms that keeps everyone anonymous and puts you in charge. Created and hosted in the EU, powered by renewable energy.
nodes.title: Microanalytics.io - Privacy-focussed alternative to the big analytics platforms.
nodes.author: Andrew Jackson

nodes.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
nodes.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
nodes.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products â¤ï¸
nodes.author: Kai Oelfke

nodes.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
nodes.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.
nodes.author: Nitin Sudhakar

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! ğŸ˜ Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. ğŸ™Œ
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
nodes.author: Robert Thelen

nodes.excerpt: Ethi helps you find out how Facebook tracks you across the internet, across the world, collects hundreds of interests about you and tracks your social life. Then we help you delete what you no longer want them to keep!
nodes.title: Ethi - Find out what Facebook knows about you, and delete it.
nodes.author: Michael Jelly

nodes.excerpt: PrivacyGrader.com provides an online assessment within 24 hours that measures how well a businessâ€™s website upholds consumer data protection laws, assesses privacy functionality, and highlights potential gaps and issues with the site.
nodes.title: PrivacyGrader - Analyzing a website's privacy & compliance in under 24 hours
nodes.author: Alexandra Velasquez

nodes.excerpt: dLinks lets you build a decentralized profile on Web 3.0 in seconds. Built using Handshake and Sia: Handshake names are decentralized domains that no one can block access to. Skynet offers decentralized backend hosting that cannot be taken down.
nodes.title: dLinks - An easy to use, no-code site builder for Web 3.0
nodes.author: Neeraj Thakur
